dialogues.text:
Hey... that thing that just appeared, does it
mean I now have three charges?

Affirmative.
The material that appeared after collecting the
prism does not match any previous records.

There it is again... We've seen this before.
It’s a portal. Each prism I take alters the planet’s
structure. You notice, right?

Don’t overthink it. We’ve done this before, and
it never caused any problems.

After all I've seen here I know what to do..
Go through your initial protocols.
Analyze, study, and understand everything you
see. I need you to be back to full functionality.
